column4: Welcome, you are now talking to an AI doctor. As I am part of a scientific experiment, I would appreciate it if you could take the time to answer a super short questionnaire at the end of the interview. Tap Speak to ask your question and then tap Send to submit it to me.
my skin is itching after shower what should i do

That could be an allergic reaction to something in the water or it could be caused by contact dermatitis. I advise you to avoid showering in hot water and use warm water instead. You should also take antihistamines to reduce the itching and look out for any further signs of irritation. If the itching persists, please consult a doctor.
